title: Week 10 Picks, Zeke Suspension Update, Rich Gannon Interview (Football 11/10)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Will Brinson, and Jason La Canfora link up for another week of picks against the spread. First, Nick, Will and Jason give yet another update on Ezekiel Elliott and we finally might have a lasting decision (maybe). They also discuss Timmy Jernigan's contract extension with the Eagles, and Martellus Bennett re-joining the Pats. Then, JLC and Pete swap spots for weekly wagers and best bets. They chat Bill-Saints, Steelers-Colts, Chargers-Jags, Cowboys-Falcons, Patriots-Broncos and more. Finally, Nick and Pete are joined by longtime NFL quarterback and current NFL on CBS analyst Rich Gannon to discuss the state of quarterback play across the league, what it takes to play the position and succeed at an older age, and more!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora update the Zeke Elliott suspension, make Week 10 picks against the spread and chat with Rich Gannon
